top.author: @Lolipeterh
top.text: iMessage/Gmail staying 'safe' relied on friction costs. AI drops those to zero, so every channel becomes a spam vector simultaneously. 75 days feels optimistic, we're already seeing it.

top.author: @JeanCruces24781
top.text: Most teams say they’re “multi-channel.” What they really mean is: ➙ LinkedIn is running ➙ Email is running ➙ Maybe X is running But nothing is connected. x No shared data. x No coordinated timing. x No learning loop. That’s not multi-channel. That’s parallel chaos.
top.translationZh:
大多数团队都说自己是"多渠道运营"，但实际上是：

➙ LinkedIn在跑
➙ 邮件在跑  
➙ 可能X也在跑

但什么都没连起来。

x 数据不共享
x 时机不协调
x 没有学习闭环

这不是多渠道运营。

这是并行混乱。

• 衡量节省的时间和错误率

top.text: Trying @Filo_Mail and loving it. Summaries + to-dos make email feel lighter. 90 days of Plus for free via my link: https:// filomail.com/refer/SVD5 https:// filomail.com/refer/SVD5

top.author: @bpradeepnair
top.text: Meeting notetaker Read AI on Thursday launched an AI-powered email-based assistant called Ada, saying it helps users manage their schedules, answer questions based on a company’s knowledge base, and reply to out-of-office emails.
top.translationZh: 会议记录工具Read AI周四推出了一款基于邮件的AI助手Ada，据说能帮用户管理日程、基于公司知识库回答问题，还能自动回复外出办公邮件。

top.author: @Amoredatecom
top.text: The city has its own rhythm in the end of winter Exploring the local market and finding hidden gems. It’s amazing how a simple walk can spark so much inspiration. What does your city look like right now? #LocalVibes #CityWalk #ExploreMore #Amoredate
top.translationZh: 冬末的城市有着自己独特的节奏，逛逛本地市集总能发现一些宝藏小店。神奇的是，一次简单的漫步就能激发这么多灵感。你们那里的城市现在是什么样子？#LocalVibes #CityWalk #ExploreMore #Amoredate

top.author: @Dizzydennis
top.text: The long wait between seasons has me feel like my spark and excitement has waned a bit… But seeing the Straw Hats interact and then that amazing original score playing when Luffy came on screen! Gosh, I am so ready!
top.translationZh: 两季之间漫长的等待让我觉得自己的热情和兴奋都消退了不少...但是看到草帽团的互动，还有路飞出场时那段超棒的原创配乐响起！天哪，我已经完全准备好了！
